column1: #Text=Remote Position(From Everywhere/No Office Location)Job type...Full-TimeWe're a transportation technology platform focused on optimizing full-truckload and drayage for all stakeholders (shippers, trucking companies (primarily smaller trucking companies), warehouses, and ports).
#Text=We aim to create value through enabling robust, yet easy to use technology combined with industry expertise and insane customer service.

#Text=We are looking for an experienced fullstack software developer with 3+ years of professional experience.Requirements & Responsibilities Take full ownership and responsibility for building, shipping, and maintaining features 3+ years experience as a front-end developer using .Net/C# Experience with Microsoft SQL Server or other relational database management systems History testing frameworks Experience with RESTful apis Familiarity with backend technologies 3+ years of experience with React, Redux, Webpack, HTML, CSS, etc.

#Text=(A plus: UI/UX design, mobile apps development)Pluses Experience with Azure DevopsWe'd love to connect to see if your skill-set, work ethic, creativity, and customer empathy aligns with our team.

#Text=We're passionate about what we do and know the right person will thrive in our team.This is a part time remote role with a committment to a minimum of 10 - 20 hours weekly.Job Type: Part-timePay: From $30.00 per hourSchedule: Self-determined scheduleEducation: High school or equivalent (Preferred)Experience: React: 1 year (Preferred) Redux: 1 year (Preferred) Back-end development: 1 year (Preferred We are looking for an experienced fullstack software developer with 3+ years of professional experience 3+ years experience as a front-end developer using .Net/C# Experience with Microsoft SQL Server or other relational database management systems History testing frameworks Familiarity with backend technologies 3+ years of experience with React, Redux, Webpack, HTML, CSS, etc Experience with Azure Devops We'd love to connect to see if your skill-set, work ethic, creativity, and customer empathy aligns with our team Take full ownership and responsibility for building, shipping, and maintaining features Pay: From $30.00 per hour Self-determined schedule
